Force_Bolt.help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Force_Bolt.targetHelp: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Power_Punch.help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends him flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Power_Punch.targetHelp: A powerful thrust from the Ballista that does smashing and energy damage and knocks you back.

Protective_Shield.help: Dramatically protects an ally from Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage and protects the target from Endurance Draining effects.
Protective_Shield.shortHelp: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic, End Drain)
Protective_Shield.targetHelp: You have been encased in a Protective Shield.
Protective_Shield.targetShortHelp: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(Toxic, End Drain)

Repulsion_Field.help: This Toggle power creates a field that violently repels nearby foes.

Dispersion_Bubble.help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attacks except Psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.targetHelp: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses and providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.
Dispersion_Bubble.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.
